product_name: Patagonia All Weather Capri Pants - Women's
long_description: The Patagonia All Weather capris keep you motivated to burn calories with their soft comfort and flattering, easy fit. Polyester and spandex fabric is designed for activity and wicks moisture, and mesh panels on the side of thighs enhance breathability. Wide, flattering waistband fits snugly and features a drawcord. Put your key in the center-back envelope pocket for safe keeping. Reflective logos on front and back enhance visibility. The Patagonia All Weather capris offer a slim fit with a mid rise.
short_description: The Patagonia All Weather capris keep you motivated to burn calories with their soft comfort and flattering, easy fit.
